articles.description: Customer of Thai heritage awarded €12,000 after employee drew image on cup
articles.content:
A Dublin Starbucks outlet has been ordered to pay 12,000 compensation to an Irish customer with Thai heritage after an employee drew slanty eyes on the womans matcha tea latte cup.
Workplace Relatio… [+3525 chars]
